about_the_game:
Etherburn is a student game and offers Souls-like gameplay in a medieval dark fantasy setting. Play as a revived Hero, a legendary knight who's name is lost to time. Your goal is to explore and escape the dungeon on one of many Routes.

On your perilious Journey you will encounter Foes and might even die in Combat against them. But Death is not the End: The Dungeon is filled with the life-giving Powers of Ether - bringing you and your Enemies back to life in due time.

Explore an interconnected Dungeon - filled with different Biomes and Areas to explore. Discover different parts of the Dungeon in a medieval dark fantasy setting in the attempt to find the right path to escape.

Master various weapons and unleash deadly attacks to defeat your enemies. Weaken your foes and finish them off with brutal executions. Unlock new weapons as you journey through the Dungeon - looking for a way out.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are explicit scenes where the player fights grotesque and disturbing creatures. The storyline explores dark and oppressive themes such as death, despair, and survival in a besieged city. 

There are no depictions of sexual acts or sexual violence. Drug or alcohol abuse, as well as self-harm, are not featured in the game.

detailed_description:
Etherburn is a student game and offers Souls-like gameplay in a medieval dark fantasy setting. Play as a revived Hero, a legendary knight who's name is lost to time. Your goal is to explore and escape the dungeon on one of many Routes.

On your perilious Journey you will encounter Foes and might even die in Combat against them. But Death is not the End: The Dungeon is filled with the life-giving Powers of Ether - bringing you and your Enemies back to life in due time.

Explore an interconnected Dungeon - filled with different Biomes and Areas to explore. Discover different parts of the Dungeon in a medieval dark fantasy setting in the attempt to find the right path to escape.

Master various weapons and unleash deadly attacks to defeat your enemies. Weaken your foes and finish them off with brutal executions. Unlock new weapons as you journey through the Dungeon - looking for a way out.
name: Etherburn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Etherburn is a Souls-like action-adventure. Play as a hero resurrected in a mysterious and interconnected dungeon. Explore and face intense duels as you fight your way to freedom.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
